page.title: 06INTERESTS
page.content: IN LAVERSTOKE MOST PEOPLE USE THEIR SPARE TIME WATCHING TELEVISION.MOST PEOPLE LIKE DRAMA.THE LEAST FAVOURITES ARE MUSIC,NEWS AND SHOWS.A LOT OF PEOPLE LIKE PLAYING GAMES IN THE HOUSE.BOARD GAMES ARE THE MOST POPULAR IN THE SCHOOL.ON SOME WEEK DAYS THE CUBS,SCOUTS AND BEAVERS GET TOGETHER AND HAVE FUN.THEY PLAY GAMES,MAKE THINGS,GO TRACKING AND DO LOTS OF OTHER THINGS.THERE ARE FIVE PEOPLE IN OUR SCHOOL THAT GO TO CUBS.IN OUR SCHOOL SOME PEOPLE GO TO CLUBS LIKE MAJORETTES,GYMNASTICS ETC.AT OVERTON SCHOOL WE HAVE A SWIMMING CLUB.IN OVERTON THERE ARE TWO BROWNIE PACKS 1ST AND 2ND OVERTON.IN WELLS IN THE FIELD MRS.NOBLE TAKES PIANO LESSONS FOR PEOPLE OVER FIVE.THERE ARE FIVE PEOPLE IN OUR SCHOOL THAT GO.
